DOC.brief_title: Project Power : An HIV Risk Reduction Intervention Black Men Who Have Sex With Men Women ( BMSM/W )
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study examine preliminary efficacy , feasibility acceptability deliver culturally developmentally tailor HIV risk reduction intervention via Internet real-time promotes risk reduction among black men sex men woman ( BMSMW ) . During Developmental Phase , activity consist complete development ( finalizing session , complete manual ) theoretically ground , culturally base , individual intervention , Project POWER , reduce risk HIV acquisition transmission among BMSMW . The investigator conduct randomize controlled trial ( RCT ) test preliminary efficacy , acceptability , feasibility POWER compare HEALTH . Using chain referral method , investigator recruit 200 BMSMW ( 100 per arm ) assign 1 2 condition ( POWER HEALTH ) . Participants complete assessment battery deliver via ACASI baseline , immediate post intervention 3 month post intervention . The investigator also measure uptake HIV STI test . Participants also complete acceptability/feasibility assessment
DOC.criteria: Self identify Black African descent At least 18 year age Resident Chicago MSA Sexually active men woman Previously participate study Identify transgendered
